title: KEY FRAGMENTS DROPS MUST HAVE A UPDATE!
body: hey guys and everyone who reads it i am trying to get a key fragments  for weeks i got already 4 chests and nothing and i know riot did it for ppl to buy keys and chests becuse thay need the money and its fine by me but please change the drop systme i am getting crazy and i wanna ask something can u get to a point when u got 0 chance of getting a key fragment?

replies.body:
> **FEELS LIKE I'M NOT GETTING MANY KEY FRAGMENTS ANYMORE. WHAT GIVES?**
>
The drop rate for key fragments is a curve, not a line. With each fragment you earn, the chance to earn your next one goes down slightly. This number resets roughly every thirty days after you earn your first key fragment.
>
We wanted to give players who didn't play as frequently a good drop rate for keys, without making it feel like farming was mandatory if you wanted keys.
>
**Note:** There's currently a bug which prevents you from earning key fragments if you're playing a champion you don't own. This is unintended, and we're working on a solution.

Also, you are guaranteed a key fragment after winning a certain number of games without one. While you are not meant to 'farm' them, if you continue playing you will receive some if you want. However, if you have had a recent punishment on your account you may be [ineligible for Hextech loot](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/57wOcrmh-if-you-are-ineligible-for-hextech-loot-read-here-for-info-on-becoming-eligible-again), though you should know if this was the case.
no i dont have  punishment but i got alot of key fragments recently but i want to know if the chance of getting key can get to 0?
if it's a normal exponential function the chance would approach 0 but never hit it so there will always be a very small chance of getting a key

The only way to not be eligible for key fragments is by having hextech restrictions caused by behavioral occurrences.  I looked into your specific issue, and everything looks okay!  I see that you've received a healthy amount of keys over the last week, but keep in mind that the drop rate is more of a curve.  You can obtain key fragments more slowly as you receive them, until the rate resets roughly every 30 days.  More information on this can be found on our [Hextech Crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  I hope that helps clear things up!

Hey Porocles,

I see you answering this damn question 10 times a day in the Red Tracker. Has Riot considered displaying the timing of this reset in-client? Feels like it would save you a lot of time, and even for people who do understand the system already, that's still interesting to access this information directly, instead of half-guessing through your drop-rates in the previous month.

The timer would be different for everyone and it doesnt go by games it goes by wins so if you dont play for a while the timer would be paused.. unless its showing days.. thats not really a MUST because it would just be counting down 30 days from day 1 and reset. so you want a 30 day timer? seems excessive unless they show the drop rate percentage as you win. i dont see it being something of an issue on the forefront so who knows if this is even worth it.

Yes I want a 30-day timer, precisely because it is different for everyone.

I want to know if my reset is today or next week, without keeping a spreadsheet of my previous key fragments drops...

Yea I've learned with this company they don't seem to care about simple concepts until it's too late and even then they execute some of them wrong. I guess it got overlooked because they prioritize 4 chests a month n figure you'll get the 12 keys if you really want them and once you get down to hardly getting any 30 days is coming up or already passed. I know because I play a lot of aram I get my keys within the first 10-15 days it seems like.
